item.description:
On 24th, of Dec. , Friday,

We have spacey and cozy function room with the bar/kitchen, tables, armchairs etc., adjusted to a nice garden/patio to celebrate winter Holidays in a big and warm family of friends!!

All to us!! 5 pm till 11 - 12 pm.

Pot luck, please make your favorite/traditional/cultural/..dish (let me know what is it going to be), bring music (CD), instrument, wine, happy yourself !!
We'll have an hour-two of appetizers, aperitifs, chats, following main course, some team building activities (share ideas!) and smoothly ending the party with Yankee Swap and sweets ..dance too?
Please bring a small nice wrapped gift of $ 15 for the game.

http://www.weeno.com/...

I will provide plates, forks, spoons, napkins, cups, and a warming delicious soup.

Hope you can make it!

Brook House management rule is to have a list of names of all guests.
Please send me by email your first and last name. I will respond with "confirm" email and my address.
Brook House Function room is in Brookline, Longwood area, rt 9.

Happy Holidays!
Maia
781-718-6203

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Winter Wonderland Potluck Dinner
